resources.string: There are no Internet calling accounts on this device. Add one now?
Please wait while your device is being programmed.

If you skip activation, you can\'t place calls or connect to mobile data networks (though you can connect to Wi-Fi networks). Until you activate your device, you are asked to activate it each time you turn it on.
Your device is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.
A special call needs to be made to activate your device service. \n\nAfter pressing \u201CActivate\u201D, listen to the instructions provided to activate your device.

Your device did not activate. 
You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside). 

Try again or call customer service for more options.
Your SIM card has been unblocked. Your device is unlocking\u2026
